Lists data for a given Databrary party (institution or person).

Source: R/list_party.R
list_party.Rd

Lists data for a given Databrary party (institution or person).

list_party(party_id = 8, component = "all", vb = FALSE)

Arguments

party_id

Target volume number.
component

The specific data to retrieve for the party, c("all", "children", "parents")
vb

A Boolean value. If TRUE provides verbose output.

Value

A list (or data frame) with the requested data.

Examples

list_party() # Default is New York University (party 8)

#> $id
#> [1] 8
#> 
#> $sortname
#> [1] "New York University (NYU)"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "http://www.nyu.edu/"
#> 
#> $institution
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $parents
#>   party.id party.sortname party.institution
#> 1        0      Databrary              TRUE
#> 
#> $children
